definition: to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]

sentences.english: Arrays that are returned by properties are not write-protected, even if the property is read-only.
sentences.chinese: 即使属性是唯读，所传回的阵列不会是写入保护。

sentences.english: Enumerators provide read-only access to the data in a collection.
sentences.chinese: 列举值提供对集合中资料的唯读存取。

sentences.english: Describes how read-only information is displayed in the class diagram.
sentences.chinese: 说明唯读资讯如何显示在类别图表中。

sentences.english: The calculated symbols are placed in a read-only symbols file.
sentences.chinese: 计算符号放置在唯读符号档内。

sentences.english: Specify whether the recordset is read-only or append-only.
sentences.chinese: 指定资料录集是唯读或仅能附加的。
该存档档案具有唯读属性。

sentences.english: The database classes support read-only joins but not updateable joins.
sentences.chinese: 资料录类别支援唯读联结，而不支援可更新的联结。

definition: a sage/wise and holy man/virtuous ruler/Buddhist lama/wine
the Book of Songs 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1] and the Book of History 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
to be both a farmer and a scholar/to work the land and also undertake academic studies
the Book of Songs 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1] and Classic of Rites 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4]/a cultured well-read person
to act in accordance with the old rules (idiom)/to follow a proven formula
Confucian moral injunctions of fidelity/piety to one's parents, respect to one's older brother, loyalty to one's monarch, faith to one's male friends
doing good deeds brings the greatest joy (idiom)
words of truth/moral expressed in words/written article explaining a moral
